channel.title: ||FurkanScape|| Development (Recruiting) ~~Join Now~~
channel.description:
[center][IMG]http://img142.imageshack.us/img142/2724/mybannerglittereaae08f5rl0.gif[/img][/center]
I've decided to make a development team.
Some Updates Made Already: Working Specials 85% Need Fixing Working NPC training Working Client Working 377 cache with Skillcapes
Updates: Jad Mini-Game Fixing Specials New Training Places
Some Pictures of the Client And Server:
Client: [IMG]http://i234.photobucket.com/albums/ee311/bugra52/client.jpg[/img]
Server Pictures:
[IMG]http://i234.photobucket.com/albums/ee311/bugra52/highlevel-2.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i234.photobucket.com/albums/ee311/bugra52/trainingskills.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i234.photobucket.com/albums/ee311/bugra52/lowlevel1.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i234.photobucket.com/albums/ee311/bugra52/home.jpg[/img]
Ok now you can apply only for these :)
[center]Co-Owners/Owner -Mod Furkan -DuhPk[/center]
[center]Coders -Bugra52 -[/center]
[center]Admins -Si Force -[/center]
[center]Mods -pkforlol3 -[/center]
[center]Forum Designers - - -[/center]
Now to Apply For these you must use this For Coders
[code]Name: In-Game Name: Msn: Aim: Coder Xp: How long have you been coding: Proof:[/code]
To Apply For Forum Designers
[code]Name: Forum Name: In-Game Name: Msn: Aim: How Many Forums You made: Proof:[/code]
Co-Owner [code]Name: In-Game Name: Msn: Aim: Why you should be co-owner: How will you provide people with consequences:[/code]
Admin/Mod [code]Name: In-Game Name: Msn: Aim: Job: When to ban/kick someone:[/code]
This will be updated time to time
Thankz For Reading :)
[size=16pt]You must apply for one job :)[/size]
If you apply for coder you must have msn and we must make sharing folder every update must be inside the sharing folder!
